examples: She felt embarrassed under his steady gaze.
His deep blue gaze held hers.
(figurative) Pop stars are constantly exposed to the public gaze.
They fixed their gaze on the dark line of the coast ahead. She fixed him with a level gaze. He turned his gaze on me.
She refused to meet my gaze.
I followed her gaze and spotted a new arrival at the far side of the room.
She deliberately averted her gaze when he came in.
His gaze flickered an instant. His gaze flickered over the room.
Her gaze followed Simon's through the archway.
Her gaze fixed on his and held it unblinkingly. His gaze locked with hers.
Rebecca's gaze rested on the child thoughtfully.
Her gaze fell on Kate's tousled hair.
He blushed under her angry gaze.
